Description: Transaction amount in THB . Must be greater than 0.
Unique end-to-end transaction identifier. Must be UUID format.
Transaction category purpose code (e.g., ' RFT '). Must be a valid BOT category.

Unique reference number assigned for the transaction. Copy as text Bahtnet Reference Number Mandatory for CMS, ALS(SM), PMH Pattern : BBBBTSSSSS BBBB: Branch No(0700) T : From Application 0 = CMS 7 = ALS-SM(PN) 8 = PMH SSSSS : Sequence No
Mapping: Set value as " 0700 8 " + 5 digits running number starting from 1 generate from sequence named bahtnet_transaction_seq .

Description: Transaction message type. Valid values: '008'
Mapping: get value from app.yaml, current value as "008"

Description: Transaction date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Must be a valid date.

System channel for the transaction.
Mapping: get value from app.yaml, current value as " pmh "

Description: Channel from which the transaction originated.
Unique identification to identify the transaction. Format : <ChannelCode> (3) + <subId/subfunction> (3)> < YYMMDD (6)> + <running (11)> + <random (2)>
Branch number where the transaction originated.
ID of the employee processing the transaction.
Unit หน่วยงานเจ้าของรายการ Mandatory when employeeId = NULL
Teller number processing the transaction.
Authorized teller number.
Original reference number generated by originate_channel.
Source of funds for the transaction.
Reference for source of funds. (for fundSof = 4,5)
Creditor agent branch.
Customer type of the debtor (p = Person, c = Corporate).
Debtor telephone number.
Issuer's country code.
Manage fee by KBN flag Y = Manage fee by KBN , N = Manage fee by channel
Region area code for creditor.
Flag for automatic fee calculation.
Total fee applicable for the transaction.
Lease line fee applicable if fund_sof = 3.
Inter-region deposit fee applicable if fund_sof = 3.
Bahtnet transaction fee.
Inter-region Bahtnet fee applicable if auto_fee_flag = 2.
Method of fee collection (1 = cash, 2 = transfer, 3 = deduction).
Tax Number 13 digits (Mandatory when Flag Refund Tax = Y)
Flag Refund Tax (Flag คืนภาษี) Y = คืนภาษี, N = ไม่คืนภาษี
